description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Tasmania, Australia. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Explore Tasmania's North with Onsite Dining, Bar & Indoor Pool
hotels.description: Escape to the enchanting charm of this unique hotel boasting self-contained havens in the heart of Launceston. Nestled 10 minutes from the city and a stone's throw away from breathtaking nature like Cataract Gorge and the Tamar Island Wetlands, Country Club Villas blends comfort and convenience with unique Tasmanian beauty. Step outside to find parking at your door, a playground for little adventurers and a serene BBQ area for memorable evenings. Indulge in dining delights at the onsite restaurant and pizzeria, or dive into relaxation in the indoor pool. Set within 300 acres of parkland, lakes and rolling paddocks, this idyllic retreat offers a perfect escape. Explore nearby bush trails, then hop on a complimentary shuttle to Country Club Resort, which hosts more restaurants and bars.

seo.title: Hoteles en Tasmania - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Tasmania, Australia con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
